title: This solo developer can't stop making his own riffs on famous stealth games, and his next looks like the best one yet
description: From Metal Gear Solid to Splinter Cell, Antonio Freyre has carved out his own sneaky niche on Steam.

title: After 9 years of waiting, horse fans are underwhelmed by the Sims 4 Horse Ranch expansion reveal
description: The first trailer has equine enjoyers feeling mixed about the expansion's accuracy.

title: For Deus Ex's 23rd Anniversary, its most chaotic mod is literally flipping the script with a new mirror mode
description: The Deus Ex Randomizer continues to offer way more than just randomization.

title: Filthy Diablo 4 infinite spawn glitch makes it rain loot for as long as you want
description: Farm XP and legendaries until Blizzard nerfs this one too.

title: The first trailer for the big budget GameStop—Reddit stock scandal film reveals a surprisingly stellar cast
description: umb Money stars Paul Dano, Pete Davidson, Vincent D'Onofrio, Nick Offerman, America Ferrera, Seth Rogen, and several other big names.

title: Final Fantasy 16's PC version is next on Yoshi-P's to-do list
description: The IRL loading screen gets longer as the in-game ones get shorter.

title: Email reveals PlayStation boss wasn't actually worried about Call of Duty becoming Xbox exclusive: 'We'll be OK, more than OK'
description: Shortly after the proposed acquisition was announced, Jim Ryan said he expects to see Call of Duty games on PlayStation consoles "for many years to come."

title: Activision is shutting down the original Call of Duty: Warzone after only 3 years
description: Warzone is dead, long live Warzone.

title: Todd Howard confirms Starfield won't let you ride aliens or go fishing, so modders: you know what to do
description: That planet? You can go to it. But that alien dinosaur? You can't ride it. Modders, you've got your first assignments.

title: Blizzard unveils Diablo 4's Hardcore Lilith statue and it's metal as hell (but also quietly dignified)
description: The statute will be emblazoned with the names of the first 1,000 Diablo 4 players to reach level 100 in Hardcore mode.

title: Metal Gear Solid 4 is finally being freed of its PlayStation 3 prison
description: "I'm no hero. Never was. Just an old killer hired to do some wetwork."

title: Xbox is hiking Game Pass prices but sparing PC Game Pass, at least for now
description: Microsoft says the higher price "reflects competitive market conditions."

title: BioWare calls Star Wars: The Old Republic's change in developer 'a new beginning' and denies that it's going into maintenance mode
description: A third-party studio is taking over, but "more story and modernization initiatives" are still coming.

title: 'About 10%' of Starfield's 1000+ planets have life on them as the game tries to capture 'the magnificent desolation' of space, says Todd Howard
description: Starfield's director says the game's exploration is "different than we've had" in Bethesda's previous games.

title: PC Gamer Chat Log Episode 17: The post-not E3 debrief
description: Lauren, Mollie and Robin try and unpack a week full of announcements, trailers and strange celebrity appearances.

title: In this mashup of Crusader Kings and RimWorld, I spent a huge amount of time watching people vomiting on each other
description: The one thing peasants and nobles have in common is an inability to hold their booze.

title: The competitive fighting game community deserves better, and might finally be getting it: 'we're the next big thing'
description: The FGC has lagged behind other esports for investment and prize money, but the tides may be turning.

title: Diablo 4's latest mystery is its hidden post-credits scenes, and players are scrambling for answers
description: Who are the figures in the fire?

title: AOKZOE A1 Pro
description: Definitely more than a Steam Deck, but better than an ROG Ally?

title: Sand Land is a promising manga-styled Mad Max with more tanks and much more slapstick
description: An Akira Toriyama manga other than Dragon Ball finally gets a new game adaptation.

title: Solid Snake says he's not worried about AI stealing work from voice actors: 'it'll always be soulless'
description: David Hayter is not impressed with AI scripts either.

title: Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg end up agreeing to a cage fight after argument over the word 'sane'
description: Billionaire clowns bloviating at one another.

title: New Marvel movie has AI-generated opening credits, and they're somehow even worse than you'd expect
description: At last, Marvel have recreated the Skrull invasion from the comic storyline 'do not let the Skrull invasion happen'

title: South Korea leaks the existence of Quake 2 Remastered a mere 2 years after it leaked the existence of Quake 1 Remastered
description: Beginning to think game publishers should just coordinate their announcements around South Korea's rating schedule.

title: This is awkward: some aerospace company just rebranded as RTX
description: Jensen Huang might have something to say about this.

title: Bungie says it will 'compensate and credit' artist whose work was 'mistakenly' used in this week's major Destiny 2 cutscene
description: Studio claims an "external vendor" mistook it for official art.

title: The Metal Gear Solid collection is including the non-canon game Kojima hates
description: No mouse and keyboard support either.

title: Intel's forcing its chip designers to pay market rates not mate's rates at its own fabs
description: Splitting the fab and products sides of Intel's business is both an effort in cost savings and enticing customers in to pay for its facilities.

title: Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes' 'Definitive Edition' updates almost nothing, but at least it's a second chance for the best puzzle RPG ever made
description: A quick cashgrab, or an earnest attempt to give a classic a new life? I'm torn.

title: You can buy an official Starfield skateboard for reasons I can't even pretend to understand
description: It's $75 and you'll have to bring your own wheels.

title: Down to the depths with any dev who makes 'create desktop shortcut' the default option
description: Here's how to stop rogue icons from haunting your home screen.

title: PC Gamer UK August issue on sale now: Broken Roads
description: Plus: Street Fighter 6, Classified: France '44, Exoprimal, MotoGP 23, System Shock, Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast, and much more!

title: If you own an Asus router, you should update the firmware to protect against critical vulnerabilities right now
description: A public service announcement.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #733: Thursday, June 22
description: Help with the #733 puzzle if you need it.

title: Cities: Skylines 2's cool new road tools are already making me think my city won't be a traffic-filled hellscape
description: My nemesis—traffic—may finally be easier to defeat in Cities: Skylines 2.
